testcase.name: US01_TC01 User must be able to login to the Site with a valid URL
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to url......................................................passed Then The user verifies that at "https://www.amazon.com/"....................passed And The user closes the page................................................passed

testcase.name: US02_TC01 The user should be able to login with valid information. (Positive Login)
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to url......................................................passed Then The user clicks the Sign-In button.....................................passed When User enters valid email................................................passed Then The user clicks the continue button....................................passed When User enters valid password.............................................passed Then The user clicks the Sign-In button.....................................passed And The user sees the text "Hello,USER".....................................passed Then User logs out of account...............................................passed And The user closes the page................................................passed

testcase.name: US02_TC02 The user should not be able to login with invalid information. (Negative Login)
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to url......................................................passed Then The user clicks the Sign-In button.....................................passed When User enters valid email................................................passed Then The user clicks the continue button....................................passed When User enters invalid password...........................................passed Then The user clicks the Sign-In button.....................................passed And The user closes the page................................................passed

testcase.name: US02_TC03 The user should not be able to login with invalid information. (Negative Login)
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to url......................................................passed Then The user clicks the Sign-In button.....................................passed When User enters invalid email..............................................passed Then The user clicks the continue button....................................passed And The user closes the page................................................passed
